title: The Eucomia Tree
subtitle: Eucomia a TCM herb and an alternative to Guttapercha
description: Eucommia ulmoides is a species of small tree native to China. It belongs to the monotypic family Eucommiaceae. It is considered vulnerable in the wild, but is widely cultivated in China for its bark and is highly valued in herbology such as traditional Chinese medicine.(from wikipedia)
